fields.name: ADIDAS ADULTS KAKARI Z.0 SOFT GROUND
fields.description: Domination is about more than just brute force. That's why adidas created these lightweight Kakari Z.0 rugby boots. Designed to add mobility to the front five, they show off a sleek new silhouette. The synthetic leather upper hides an internal strap that adds serious lockdown. Underneath, a split outsole flexes to support dynamic runs and quick offloads.
fields.features: Regular fit,Lace closure,Optimal support,Snug,sock-like feel,Tough,lightweight rugby boots,Replaceable aluminium studs,Provide traction when scrummaging,Upper: Textile
